ValidationRule.description: Sales Rep Do Not Change Net Revenue
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
OR(
AND( OR( $Profile.Name = "Core Sales", $Profile.Name = "Core Virtual Sales Rep", $Profile.Name = "Core Sales - SB" ,$Profile.Name = "Hybrid Sales Rep"), RecordType.DeveloperName ="CoreOpportunityDSARecordType" || RecordType.Name = "Core Referral Revenue Opportunity Record Type - DSA"),
AND( OR ( BEGINS($Profile.Name,'HRS 401(k) Sales'), BEGINS($Profile.Name,'HNBF Sales Rep'), BEGINS($Profile.Name,'HRS PEO Centric Sales'), BEGINS($Profile.Name,'HRS PEO-ASO Sales') ,$Profile.Name = "Hybrid Sales Rep"), OR( $RecordType.Name = 'PEOASOOpportunityFSSRecordType', $RecordType.Name = 'PEO_Opportunity_FSS_Record_Type', $RecordType.Name = 'HNBF_Opportunity_DSA_Record_Type', $RecordType.Name = 'HRS401kOpportunityFSSRecordType')),
AND( OR( $Profile.Name = "NSS Outbound Rep", $Profile.Name = "NSS Inbound Rep"), RecordType.Name = "Core Referral Revenue Opportunity Record Type - DSA"),
AND( OR ($Profile.Name ="MMS Sales",$Profile.Name ="MMS Sales - SB" ,$Profile.Name ="MMS Sales Quote",$Profile.Name = 'MMS SDR'), $RecordType.Id ="MMSOpportunityDSARecordType" || $RecordType.Id ="MMSReferralRevenueOpportunityDSA"),
AND( OR( $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Payment_Processing_DSA_Opportunity', $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PCWC_Opportunity_DSA_Record_Type', $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'TAA_DSA_Opportunity_Record_Type') ) ),
PRIORVALUE(Probability) >= 0.9, NOT( $User.Sales_Division__c = 'Virtual PC'), ISCHANGED( Amount ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the net revenue once the Opportunity has been submitted to the sales admin.
